import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { BookService } from 'src/app/services/book.service'; import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-borrowed-books', templateUrl: './borrowed-books.component.html', styleUrls: ['./borrowed-books.component.css'] }) export class BorrowedBooksComponent implements OnInit { userId:any; borrowedBooks:any constructor(private userService:UserService,private bookService:BookService){ this.userId= this.userService.getUserIdFromToken(); } ngOnInit(): void { this.bookService.getBorrowedBooks(this.userId).subscribe((res)=>{ console.log(res.$values); this.borrowedBooks=res.$values; },(error)=>{ console.log(error); }) } }
